name: The Invitation
description: A young woman is courted and swept off her feet, only to realize a gothic conspiracy is afoot.

review.author: linhchi-1993
review.heading: So boring
review.reviewBody:
It took me really excited to watch this movie when the first trailer was released. I mean, the cinematography, the good looking - posh alike Lord of the manor, the well - captured views of England countryside, as well as the skill and effort these actors/actresses and those working behind have been putting into this movie.

But all those things above could not save the day at all. In overall, this movie has a good start and a potential development, but completely wasted when it comes to wrap up. Long and boring talks, lame jokes and jump scares, a very exhausted explanation. Last but not least, I think the worst element contribute to this failing is the unlogic and unwell script.

These amazing actors and actresses have been given a bad major ingredient, how could they come up with a good meal?
